entry.title: Current Conditions: -12.9°C

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then snow and local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 19.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near noon. Temperature steady near minus 19. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 29 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 20 February 2023
